project.add_new_project_prompt: Add a new project and let us automatically detect and split songs in your sound files.

hint.darkmode: Toggle between dark and light theme.

hint.acoustid_api_key: The AcoustID application API key. You need to register an application on the AcoustID website for this. This key is necessary if you wish to use the AcoustID API for identification, which is strongly recommended.
hint.acoustid_user_key: The AcoustID user API key. You get this key simply by logging in on the AcoustID website. This key is only used if you choose to submit metadata to the APIs when saving.
hint.shazam_api_key: The Shazam API key. You need a RapidAPI account to create this key.

hint.ask_file_type: Always ask me for the file type when saving. If this is toggled off, the option from the "Save File Type" setting will always be used.
hint.submit_saved_files: Submit the detected metadata to API providers to improve their database. The only personally identifying information that will be sent with this is used to confirm you have access to the API services.
hint.output_file_name: The template for file names. You may use the placeholders {'{'}TITLE{'}'}, {'{'}ARTIST{'}'}, {'{'}ALBUM{'}'} and {'{'}YEAR{'}'}, which will be replaced with the corresponding metadata. It is strongly recommended to include the {'{'}TITLE{'}'} placeholder to avoid duplicate file names.

save.ask_file_type: Ask me what to do with each save
save.submit_saved_files: Submit files to APIs when saving

create_project.title: Create new project
create_project.list_uploaded_file: A list of your uploaded files.

song.title: Title
song.no_webm: .webm cannot be processed at the moment!

toast.save_file_success_with_submit: Has been successfully saved to {target} and submitted to {services}
toast.no_save_directory: Please set the path for the save directory in the Settings tab.

record.no_ffmpeg: Oops! It looks like ffmpeg isn't installed. Please install it using your system's package manager or download it from the official website to record from app.

project.new_project_description: Click this button to start creating a new project.
project.create_name_description: Enter a unique name for your project here.
project.create_description_description: Provide a brief description of your project.
project.create_project_files_description: Click here to upload files related to your project.
project.create_project_files_list_description: View a list of files you have uploaded for your project.
project.create_project_description: Click this button to create your project with the provided details.

record.start_description: Click this button to begin recording your media.
record.stop_description: Click this button to stop recording.
record.download_description: Click here to download the media you have recorded.
record.control_description: Use these buttons to control your media playback.
record.delete_description: Click this button to delete the recorded media files.
record.create_project_description: Fill out this form to create a new project with the recorded media.

create_project.name_exists_already: {name} already exists. Please enter a different name.
create_project.no_file_uploaded: Please upload at least one file to create a project.
